biotools.summary: TELLAPRIALBI is a calculator for Aspartate aminotransferase/platelet ratio index (APRI) and albumin–bilirubin grade (ALBI), which can be used as validated prognostic predictors of postoperative liver dysfunction after hepatic resection.
